mapper.select: SELECT VI.UUID, VI.CODE, VI.TITLE, VI.ISSUE_TYPE, VI.STATE, VI.VERSION_CODE, SV.PUBLISH_DATE FROM V_ISSUE VI LEFT JOIN S_VERSION SV ON SV.VERSION_CODE = VI.VERSION_CODE WHERE VI.OBJECT_CODE = #{object_code} ORDER BY ifnull(sv.publish_date, str_to_date('9999-12-31', '%Y-%m-%d'));
SELECT VERSION_CODE FROM S_VERSION WHERE OBJECT_CODE = #{object_code} AND IS_COMPLETE is null ORDER BY PUBLISH_DATE
SELECT UUID,ISSUE_TYPE FROM V_ISSUE WHERE VERSION_CODE = #{versionCode} AND OBJECT_CODE = #{objectCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE S_VERSION V SET V.IS_COMPLETE = '1' WHERE OBJECT_CODE = #{objectCode} AND VERSION_CODE = #{versionCode}
